replies.msg:
The 2020 HKDSE Maths (Core) Exam will commence on 2 May. In this regard, we have decided to launch another Free Mathematics Mock (Paper 2, in English ONLY) for all of you to have a final practice before the REAL exam arrives.

Date and time: 29/4/2020 1500-1615 (After your English Paper 3)

Details regarding the exam will be announced by email after applying. It should be expected that the difficulty of the paper would be close to that of the real exam.

Your performance, reference grades and the explanations of the questions will be sent to you on or before 30/4/2020.

Please don’t hesitate to join this mock event by applying via the form on https://bit.ly/3eFWKpd . Late applications will not be entertained. Good luck on DSE!
